history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_LimSup_infSup_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_LimInf_opp_LimSup_seq,is_LimSup_infSup_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: nat,Sup_seq,is_inf_seq_ext,is_LimInf_opp_LimSup_seq,is_LimSup_infSup_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: nat,Sup_seq,is_inf_seq_ext,is_LimInf_opp_LimSup_seq,Sup_seq_ext,is_LimSup_infSup_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: nat,Sup_seq,is_inf_seq_ext,is_LimInf_opp_LimSup_seq,Sup_seq_ext,is_LimSup_infSup_seq.

exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> R l : Rbar N : nat HN : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Hu : is_LimInf_seq u l Unable to unify "(is_LimSup_seq ?M2368 ?M2369 -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => ?M2368 (n + m)%nat)) ?M2369) /\\ (is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => ?M2368 (n + m)%nat)) ?M2369 -> is_LimSup_seq ?M2368 ?M2369)" with "match l with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < l + eps) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> l - eps < v n) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> M < v n | m_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < M end".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) <-> is_LimSup_seq u l" on hypothesis of type "is_LimInf_seq u l".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l <-> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l" on hypothesis of type "is_LimInf_seq u l".

exceptions.tactic: apply is_inf_seq_ext with (u := fun m => Sup_seq (fun n => u (n + m)%nat)).
exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> R l : Rbar N : nat HN : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Hu : is_LimInf_seq u l H : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l -> is_LimSup_seq u l H0 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l H1 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) H3 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) -> is_LimSup_seq u l Unable to unify "match ?M2897 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M2896 n)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M2896 n) (l + eps)) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt M (?M2896 n) | m_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M2896 n) M end" with "match l with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < l + eps) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> l - eps < v n) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> M < v n | m_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < M end".

In environment r : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar H2 : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_inf_seq u l -> is_inf_seq v l u, v : nat -> R l : Rbar N : nat HN : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Hu : is_LimInf_seq u l H : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l -> is_LimSup_seq u l H0 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l H1 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) H3 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) -> is_LimSup_seq u l H4 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => r (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l -> is_LimSup_seq u l H5 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => r (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l Unable to unify "Sup_seq ?M3403 = Sup_seq ?M3404" with "match l with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < l + eps) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> l - eps < v n) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> M < v n | m_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < M end".

In environment r0 : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar H8 : forall u v : nat -> Rbar, (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> r0 u = r0 v H6 : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_inf_seq u l -> is_inf_seq v l r : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar u, v : nat -> R l : Rbar N : nat HN : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Hu : is_LimInf_seq u l H : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l -> is_LimSup_seq u l H0 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l H1 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) H3 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) -> is_LimSup_seq u l H4 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => r (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l -> is_LimSup_seq u l H5 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => r (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l H2 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => r0 (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l -> is_LimSup_seq u l H7 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => r0 (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l Unable to unify "u ?M4073 = v ?M4073" with "match l with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < l + eps) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> l - eps < v n) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> M < v n | m_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ v n < M end".

original: intros [N HN] Hu. apply is_LimSup_infSup_seq. apply is_LimInf_opp_LimSup_seq in Hu. apply is_LimSup_infSup_seq in Hu. destruct Hu as [Hu]. apply is_inf_seq_ext with (u := fun m => Sup_seq (fun n => u (n + m)%nat)). - intros m. apply Sup_seq_ext. intros n. apply HN. lia. - apply Hu.
